nodes.text: The Ravenno was a Mesens Corporation SCT Scout Craft in the possession of the Loose Cannon pirate gang.

When Tomaas Azzameen arranged to buy a consignment of bacta to be sold on to the Rebel Alliance, the Ravenno was the craft assigned to rendezvous with the Azzameen family at Saruwen Station and escort them to the cargo transfer point.

However, once the Azzameen Gallofree Shipyards Medium Transport Vasudra had docked with the Xiytiar-class transport End Run, the Loose Cannon pirates sprang a trap designed to capture the Azzameens, presumably for later sale as slaves. Unfortunately for the would-be slavers, the Azzameens were too wily to be caught unawares, and the Loose Cannon gang were driven off.
